dialogue.text: WOO! That was NUTS! Felt like my vocal cords were gonna fall off! That thing's faster than it looks!
My ears are fucking ringing. That was... energetically chaotic.
Alert! Unit 15 is exhibiting pre-charge tachykinesia! It's agitated! Ma'am, cease the... vocalizations immediately!
Aw, look! It got stunned for a sec, just like in the game! But its aggro is back up! Round two, let's go!
Right. 'Aggro'. Because this ancient, blind, charging behemoth definitely operates on game logic.
Just... try not to get impaled this time?
Don't worry OJ, I got this! Time to get serious!
